# 10.0 Docs

- [Breaking change](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/interop/10.0/idispatchex-ireflect-cast.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where casting a COM object that implements IDispatchEx to IReflect now fails.
- [Breaking change](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/interop/10.0/native-library-search.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where single-file apps no longer look for native libraries in the executable directory.
- [Breaking change](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/interop/10.0/search-assembly-directory.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where specifying DllImportSearchPath.AssemblyDirectory as the only search flag restricts the search to the assembly directory.
